name: Flowers Grid
description: A grid of flower-like shapes created with overlapping ellipses in randomized pastel warm colors. Inspired by Vera Molnárs use of repetition and grids in generative art.

name: Flowers Grid Variation
description: A variation of the first flower grid, using black and white instead of colors. The petals are oval-shaped like in the original, with added variation in size and stroke. Inspired by Vera Molnárs use of grids, repetition, and small variations.
